title: Chandrika Floral Diamond Bridal Set - Contemporary Vaddanam Design
materials: 18K Rose and White Gold. Features meticulously set Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Hyderabadi polish applied for lasting luster and exceptional shine.
features: A contemporary take on the traditional Vaddanam design. The necklace boasts an intricate floral motif at the center, flanked by symmetrical rows of detailed pendants. The design incorporates a blend of straight lines and curves, showcasing impeccable craftsmanship. The Jhumka earrings mirror the floral design of the necklace, creating a harmonious and balanced look. Features an elongated teardrop pendant design on the necklace.
colors: Rose Gold and White Gold with clear sparkling Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones.
occasions: and other special occasions where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for modern celebrations and parties.
description: This Chandrika Floral Diamond Bridal Set offers a unique blend of traditional South Indian design and modern aesthetics. The meticulous craftsmanship and high-quality CZ stones create a luxurious look without compromising on affordability. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine and durability, making it a valuable addition to your jewelry collection. Its lightweight design ensures comfortable wear throughout long events.
